title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water.
Whisk eggs with Parmesan and pepper.
Drain pasta (reserve a little water), toss with pancetta, remove from heat.
Quickly stir in egg mixture, loosening with pasta water if needed. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices; grill or pan-sear.
Stir in cream; add chicken and cook until coated and heated through.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Mexican-style tacos filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, and cheese.
instructions: Brown beef; add taco seasoning and a splash of water; simmer.
Assemble with beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
